headline.main: In The Nation; The Proving Factors in the New Setup

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 31 -- Official Washington, which has seen the births and deaths of several successive home front "controls," spent the Memorial Day week-end in discussing the newest infant Hercules, the Office of War Mobilization. Largely because there have been several before which never came to effective maturity, the discussion has developed two schools of opinion.
abstract: Krock on failure to coordinate govt agencies
